item.title: Jim Kwik: Limitless - Book summary
item.description: Jim Kwik: Limitless Notes How can i use this? Why must i use this? When will i use this? Quotes Often when you put a label on someone or something, you create a limit - the label becomes the limitation. Whatâ€™s one of your dreams? One that is ever present, like a splinter in your brain? Imagine it in vivid detail. Visualize it. Feel it. Beliveve it. And work daily for it.
